mapper.insert: insert into rune_info( rune_name,rune_key,rune_img_path, rune_id,rune_Desc ) values( #{runeName}, #{runeKey}, #{runeImgPath}, #{runeId}, #{runeDesc} ) ON CONFLICT (rune_id) DO UPDATE SET rune_name = EXCLUDED.rune_name, rune_key = EXCLUDED.rune_key, rune_img_path = EXCLUDED.rune_img_path, rune_desc = EXCLUDED.rune_desc
